definition: to cite/to quote/to cite as evidence

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: They conducted a survey and, like researchers do, found that a bunch of variables are inter-related.
sentences.chinese: 他們只做了引證，發現二者有內在且多變的聯繫。

sentences.english: They are cited in 68% of cases.
sentences.chinese: 她們在68%的案例中被引證。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister has conveniently ignored the more significant quote.
sentences.chinese: 但總理顯然忽略了更重要的引證。

sentences.english: The devil can cite scripture for his own perpose.
sentences.chinese: 魔鬼也會引證＜聖經＞來爲自己辯護。

sentences.english: Where more than one citation is given in a single footnote, separate them with semi-colons.
sentences.chinese: 在一個腳註中多於一個引證，用分號隔開。

sentences.english: I will add a quote using type tool (T) to fill up the area above the top navigation.
sentences.chinese: 我用文字工具添加了一些引證，在文字導航的下面。

sentences.english: The FDA cited violations to “good manufacturing practice”.
sentences.chinese: FDA引證蘭伯西違反了“良好生產規範”。

sentences.english: Conclude with a quote or call to action.
sentences.chinese: 以一個引證結束，或者號召大家去行動。

sentences.english: I know of you from the ISI paper citation system.
sentences.chinese: 我是從ISI科學論文引證系統知道您。

sentences.english: For one thing, the code is in one big quoted string.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，該代碼是在一個大引證字符串中。

sentences.english: He has just quoted the sixth commandment in verse 21, and He says, “But I say to you that whoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment.
sentences.chinese: 他在第21節中引證了第六條戒律。

sentences.english: Technical superiority and security are the top benefits cited.
sentences.chinese: 技術優勢和安全才是得到引證的最重要的利益。

sentences.english: A scrapbook. Include photos and quotes and clippings and events.
sentences.chinese: 剪貼簿包含着照片，引證，剪報，和結果。

sentences.english: Both geological analysis and numerical simulation can be firmed each other.
sentences.chinese: 達到了地質分析與數值模擬相互引證的目的。

definition: a genre of poetry, developed in the Tang Dynasty, characterized by its strict form
writing style in which the main subject is approached directly from the outset/opposite of 冒題|冒题[mao4 ti2]
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
